lead_paragraph: In his first news conference since he parted ways with Amélie Mauresmo, Murray pointed to his winning record and rejected the notion that he had let her go for being a woman.

headline.print_headline: Murray Cites Challenges in Split With Coach, Her Gender Not Included
headline.main: Andy Murray Cites Challenges in Split With His Coach, Her Gender Not Included

snippet: In his first news conference since he parted ways with Amélie Mauresmo, Murray pointed to his winning record and rejected the notion that he had let her go for being a woman.
abstract: Andy Murray rejects suggestion that his split with coach Amelie Mauresmo has anything to do with gender; cites scheduling challenges all players face, which often break up relationships with coaches; their two-year partnership is expected to open doors for female coaches.
